Title: ST_CENTROID
Description: Returns a point reflecting the mathematical centroid (geometric center) for the MultiPolygon mpoly. The resulting point will not necessarily be on the MultiPolygon.
Examples:
SET @poly = ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0,20 0,20 20,0 20,0 0))');
SELECT ST_AsText(ST_Centroid(@poly)) AS center;
+--------------+
| center       |
+--------------+
| POINT(10 10) |
+--------------+
